name: add
description: Create and insert new data records into the system database

departments.description: Target department responsible for the operation

content.description: Type of content/entity to be created in the system

id.description: Unique identifier for the new record being created

type_of_time.description: Time scope classification for the new record

specific_time.description: Extract timestamp or date range (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD)

name: get
description: Retrieve and fetch existing data records from the system database

departments.description: Source department where data will be retrieved from

content.description: Type of content/entity to be retrieved from the system

id.description: Unique identifier for the content being retrieved

type_of_time.description: Time scope filter for data retrieval

specific_time.description: Extract timestamp or date range filter (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD)

name: delete
description: Remove and permanently delete existing data records from the system

departments.description: Department authority responsible for the deletion operation

content.description: Type of content/entity to be permanently removed from system

id.description: Unique identifier for the content being deleted

type_of_time.description: Time scope context for the deletion operation

specific_time.description: Extract timestamp or date range context (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD)

name: compare
description: Analyze and contrast differences between multiple records or time periods

departments.description: Department context for the comparison analysis

content.description: Type of content/entity to be compared and analyzed

id.description: Unique identifier for the primary record for comparison

type_of_time.description: Time scope framework for the comparison analysis

specific_time.description: Extract timestamp or date range for comparison (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD)

name: predict
description: Forcast and estimate future trends based on historical data patterns

departments.description: Department context for the prediction analysis

content.description: Type of content/entity to generate predictions for

id.description: Unique identifier of the base record for prediction modeling

type_of_time.description: Time horizon scope for the prediction forecast

specific_time.description: Target timestamp or date range for prediction (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD)
